headline: Why The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BK) is a Great Dividend Stock Right Now
summary: Dividends are one of the best benefits to being a shareholder, but finding a great dividend stock is no easy task. Does The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BK) have what it takes? Let's find out.

raw.headline: Why The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BK) is a Great Dividend Stock Right Now
raw.summary: Dividends are one of the best benefits to being a shareholder, but finding a great dividend stock is no easy task. Does The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BK) have what it takes? Let's find out.

headline: Biggest Gains in Innovation in the Management Top 250
summary: Companies are graded in five categories: customer satisfaction, innovation, social responsibility, employee engagement and development, and financial strength.  Bendable Labs, a private firm, works with Drucker to perform the calculations and interpret them.  Bank of New York Mellon’s score for innovation rose 16.8 points from a year earlier, to 62.4.
